Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

package it.polimi.ingsw.controller
Contains the interfaces that make up the application controller and additional implementation classes which implement business logic used by both the client and the server.

Controllers are defined as the means which allows the client to make an action on the server. The communication direction is therefore client -> server. The client will use these interfaces in order to make actions, while the server will be the actual implementation of these.
